Articles.Content: Calling 911 because Noldor in Shnoldor.

Calling 911 to declare a new page!

065212172023

new page!
Calling 911 to trick or treat.
Calling 911 because I will be at work when For Science! drops.
Calling 911 because I can't decide where to spend my science points.

Calling 911 to tell them honey mustard and ketchup on hotdogs is tasty and they (and you ) should try it

115012202023
Calling 911 because the snack you bought from the vending machine got stuck.
Calling 911 because I don't know why it's a slam dunk, if two points make a line.
Calling 911 because you saw a flying sleigh.
Calling 911 because your sleigh cannot land.
Calling 911 for directory assistance.
Calling 911 because I just found out that James Burke has a new Connections series.

Calling 911 because your friend ate pizza crust-first.

Edited December 27, 2023 by TwoCalories
Calling 911 because you can't extract the smoked deer from the home smoke pipe.
Calling 911 because someone keeps making unfunny jokes and won't stop.

E-Comm, a agency handling the majority of 911 calls in British Columbia, has released its annual list. So let's list them off.

Calling 911...

...to ask for directions home from the Drake concert.

...because the traffic light is taking too long to turn green.

...you lost a nose ring down the shower drain.

...your AirBnB host cancelled their reservation.

...your UberEats order is taking too long.

...a burger joint won't let you in before opening.

...you can't find your cell phone.

...to complain about a pothole.

...your McDonalds order is taking too long.

...a barber gave you a bad haircut.
Calling 911 because a barber gave you a bad haircut, and you don't know whom it belongs to.
Calling 911 to warn them that you are about to drive drunk.
Calling 911 because the time is catching up with all the dates in fiction.
Calling 911 because it's midnight, and your colleagues start turning into vampires at the party.
Calling 911 because I have too many books to read.
Calling 451F because he has books.
Calling 911 because I'm waiting for multiplayer.
Calling 911 because you want to play offline for a couple of weeks.
Calling 911 because your pizza delivery is over 30 minutes.
